A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Im not old enough to be a diehard fan. I enjoyed watching the original series\,  and even the last 5. I went to watch regardless of the bad reviews but i wish i didnt. Can't get that time back. Its very painful to watch\, story was stale\, choppy\,  and full of plotholes. It didnt help that it was leftist propaganda\, but i can normally ignore that if the movie is good. I cant believe the professional reviewers have this at 9 stars. They MUST have been paid for their favorable reviews.
